A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Horrible addition to the Star Wars cinematic universe. This whole movie should be thrown out from canon\, as it did nothing to advance the story line setup in the Force Awakens\, or give the audience answers from said previous movie. Rian\, you did not deliver a movie which fans wanted to see. I had to force myself to sit through the entire movie\, because it was that terrible.
